description: This table stores implant safety-related information for screening forms, including the implants' IDs, MRI safety status, safety comments, last editing user, and last editing time.

columns.name: SCREENING_FORM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the screening form record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient's implant.

columns.name: IMPLANT_SAFETY_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The implant safety status category ID for the timeout record associated with the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


MRI Safe


MRI Unsafe


MRI Conditional

columns.name: IMPLANT_SAFETY_CMT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the implant safety status comments (HNO).

columns.name: IMPLANT_SAFETY_AUD_USER_ID
columns.description: Tracks the user who last edited the implant safety status.

columns.name: IMPLANT_SAFETY_AUD_DTTM
columns.description: Tracks the last time a user updated the implant safety status.
